resources.string:
Application info:
 The application creates a notification diplaying the volume level of Ring, Alarm, and Media.
 Volumes are being checked every minute. The icon displays Ring:Alarm volumes. When Media volume is low, the separator changes to _
 There are 4 options:
 -Start Repeating Timer (automatically selected on application start)
 -Stop Repeating Timer (you ca nstart it again later)
 -Quit the application via system force stop menu.
 -Adjust ring volume.
 Every time when you open the application the notification is updated.
 Unless you force stop, the application automatically starts on boot.
 Sources: https://github.com/dyura/SoundVolumeNotify
